text: Arau yisakale imana aniche arau satkama karaiche te'omlokaka susambada diya ye, te'olokara babe ache jannata, yara taledi nadi prabahita haya, yetiya'i te'omlokaka tara paraa kono phala khabalai diya ha’ba, tetiya'i te'omloke ka’ba, itipurbe amaka e'i dharanara phala khabalai diya haichila, karana te'omlokaka phalamula sadrsyapurna karai diya ha’ba arau te'omlokara babe tata thakiba paraitraa-sangini, arau tata te'omloka cirakala thakiba
